question: Can you find a recipe for vegan lasagna and also generate an image of a vegan lasagna dish?
true_answer: A recipe for vegan lasagna found: 1) Use zucchini slices instead of pasta. 2) Use cashew cream for cheese. 3) Add a layer of spinach and mushrooms. Image of a vegan lasagna dish generated.
